t: Brand Colors

t: Amazon / #e47911 Hex Color Code, RGB and Paints
s: The hexadecimal color code #e47911 is a shade of orange. In the RGB color model #e47911 is composed of 89.41% red, 47.45% green and 6.67% blue. In the HSL color space #e47911 has a hue of 30° (degrees), 86% saturation and 48% lightness.

t: Amazon Brand Colors & Color Codes For Major Amazon Logos
s: December 4, 2024 - 4. Amazon Brand Colors For App · The most popular Amazon logo has two primary colors. Here are the color codes: Orange: Hex color: #FF9900 · RGB: (255, 153, 0) CMYK: (0, 45, 95, 0) Pantone: PMS 1375 C · Black: Hex color: #000000 · RGB: (0 0 0) CMYK: (0, 0, 0, 100) Pantone: PMS Process Black ·
